meanings.definition: A type of amino acid found in proteins.
meanings.sent1: Asparagines are essential for building proteins in our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the role of asparagines in protein synthesis.
meanings.sent3: The asparagines in the recipe gave the dish a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was as strong as the bonds between asparagines in proteins.
meanings.sent5: The importance of asparagines in our diet cannot be overstated.
